overview: This is a true story. In the summer of 2021, author Matthew Heines of Encounters USA and Russian Bigfoot researcher Igor Burtsev traveled into the Northern Cascades of Washington State to investigate signs and accounts of Bigfoot activity. What they found were three days of high strangeness, UFO activity and mysterious evidence that defies explanation. Discover the Cascade Bigfoot Blood Mystery.
title: Cascade Bigfoot Blood Mystery
